titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit for re-enrollment provisions in retirement plans of small employers.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit for re-enrollment provisions in retirement plans of small employers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill allows small employers who have a re-enrollment provision in their retirement plans a tax credit for $500 in any taxable year occurring during a specified three-year credit period.
